info.title: D&D 5E Character Creator API
info.description: RESTful API for creating and managing D&D 5th Edition (2024 ruleset) characters. Provides endpoints for character CRUD operations and reference data for classes, species, and backgrounds.

get.description: Returns a paginated list of D&D character backgrounds.
Returns detailed information about a D&D background.
Returns a single character with optional relationship includes.

delete.description: Soft deletes a character. The character is not permanently removed and can potentially be restored.

patch.description: Partially updates a character. Only include fields you want to change.

get.description: Returns a paginated list of characters with optional filtering, sorting, and relationship includes.

post.description: Creates a new D&D character with the provided details. Ability scores must be between 3-18 for character creation.

get.description: Returns a paginated list of D&D character classes.
Returns detailed information about a D&D class including subclasses and features.
Returns a paginated list of D&D character species.
Returns detailed information about a D&D species including traits.

id.description: Read-only controller for background reference data.

Handles Character CRUD operations.

All business logic delegated to CharacterService.
Read-only controller for class reference data.
Read-only controller for species reference data.
